    • moveResources

      Player choose how many Resource to move from the selected Warehouse and where to put them
      Parameters:
      indexFirstWarehouse - index of the source Warehouse
      indexSecondWarehouse - index of the destination Warehouse
      how_many_first - number of Resource to get from the first Warehouse

      Returns:
      result of the operation
